Privacy Policy

Effective date: 2025-09-04

This Privacy Policy applies to the IRON – GymTracker app (hereby referred to as “Application”) for mobile devices, created by Ivan Lozančić (hereby referred to as “Service Provider”), provided as a Freemium service. This service is intended for use “AS IS”.

Information Collection and Use

The Application collects information when you download and use it. This may include:

  • Device Internet Protocol address (IP address)
  • App usage (pages visited, time/date of use, duration)
  • Operating system and device information

The Application does not collect precise location data.

You may provide certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to: name, email address, date of birth, gender, height, weight, and user ID. This information is retained by the Service Provider and used as described in this policy.

Your personal information will not be used for marketing without your explicit consent.

The Application uses third-party services that may collect information. Please review their policies:

Data Sharing

The Service Provider may disclose information:

Opt-Out Rights

You can stop all data collection by uninstalling the Application.

Data Retention

User data is retained as long as you use the Application and for a reasonable period thereafter. To request deletion of your data, contact: ivan.lozancic97@gmail.com.

Children’s Privacy

The Application is not directed to children under 13. If discovered, such data will be deleted immediately. Parents/guardians may contact ivan.lozancic97@gmail.com if they believe a child has provided personal information.

Security

Reasonable safeguards (physical, electronic, and procedural) are used to protect your information.

GDPR & CCPA Rights

If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA) or California, you may request access, correction, or deletion of your data by contacting: ivan.lozancic97@gmail.com.
